name: The woolen leggings of the ancestors
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (poor in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users electric resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'focus kungfu attacks'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'advanced martial arts'.
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
It increases the users cold resistance somewhat.
